name: figgy
description: Figgy - Full-stack application with Vue.js, tRPC, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL
author: Figgy

scripts.script:api: bun run typecheck:strict && cd apps/api && doppler run -p figgy-be -c dev -- bun run
scripts.script:safe: bun run typecheck:strict && echo 'âœ… TypeScript validation passed' && bun run
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && doppler run -p figgy-be -c dev -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:web: cd apps/web && doppler run --project figgy-web -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:extension: cd apps/browser-extension && doppler run -p figgy-extension -c dev -- bun run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 1000 --prefix-colors "auto" --prefix "[{index}] {name}:" --names "api,web,jobs,website" "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:jobs" "bun run dev:website"
scripts.db:generate: doppler run -p figgy-be -c dev -- drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:push: doppler run -p figgy-be -c dev -- drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:migrate: doppler run -p figgy-be -c dev -- drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.db:studio: doppler run -p figgy-be -c dev -- drizzle-kit studio
